caption.p: Antioxidant activities of SBR, MOB, and GenoTX-407. ( A) Inhibitory effect on FeCl 3-induced lipid peroxidation (TBARS production) ( B) 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) radical-scavenging activity in 30 min. ( C, D) Western blotting to check the expression of Nrf2, HO-1, SOD1, and CAT in response to individual treatments ( C). Band densities normalized to GAPDH ( D). * Significantly different from vehicle controls ( p < 0.05). SBR, Scutellaria baicalensis root; MOB, Magnolia officinalis barks; GenoTX-407, combination of SBR and MOB.
